item.title: EASY QUESTION: How do you make an item Admin/Mod only?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

[quote=“camo chao, post:1, topic:96390”]How do you make an item admin/mod only? I want it where anyone can have the item, but only mods and admins cna use it, and if anyone else trys to equip it, it doesn’t let them and a message appears saying they can’t use it.

SOMEONE HELP PLEASE! TELL ME EXACTALLY WHAT I NEED TO PUT AND EXACTALLY WHERE I SHOULD PUT IT! IF IT CAN GO ANYWHERE, GIVE ME AN EXAMPLE PLEASE!

I think I know what code to put, but I don’t have a clue where to put it in the client. (Don’t say “anywhere” becuase if I just put it anywhere like in the middle of another code that won’t work, and don’t say with the other voids or anything, I don’t know what that is… tell me to put it between something and something…)[/quote]

well as its an “EASY QUESTION” why dont you figure it out yourself? and whats the point of people telling you where to put stuff when that makes you learn nothing? maybe you should try to learn java before making servers?

Read full topic

item.title: EASY QUESTION: How do you make an item Admin/Mod only?
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

The deleteitem you put it deletes it from the inventory. It won’t work if you have it equiped. If you want it like that, then you could use

if (playerHasItem == 3089 && playerRights <= 1) { deleteItem(3089, getItemSlot(3089), 1); sendMessage("This item is Mod/Admin Only! Become a Mod/Admin!"); {

Read full topic

item.title: EASY QUESTION: How do you make an item Admin/Mod only?
item.dc:creator: @Patchumz Patchumz
item.description:
@Patchumz wrote:

Thanks for the correction to my messy code, haha… and the spot you put it in doesn’t matter (And why i made it delete the item is so no one else gets it… killing them does nothing if someone else is just gunna pick it up…)

Read full topic
item.source: EASY QUESTION: How do you make an item Admin/Mod only?

item.title: EASY QUESTION: How do you make an item Admin/Mod only?
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Try changing it to this

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3098 && playerRights <1) { youdied(); sendMessage("This item is Mod/Admin Only! Become a Mod/Admin!"); }

This kills you if you have those certain items equiped.

Read full topic
item.source: EASY QUESTION: How do you make an item Admin/Mod only?

item.title: EASY QUESTION: How do you make an item Admin/Mod only?
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Change the

playerRights >2

to

playerRights <= 1

and also change

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1333)

to

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1333

item.title: EASY QUESTION: How do you make an item Admin/Mod only?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1333) && playerRights >2)

you might want to change around the playerRights > 2 to playerRights < 2 so that way when you are a admin you keep the item.

Read full topic

item.title: EASY QUESTION: How do you make an item Admin/Mod only?
item.dc:creator: @Patchumz Patchumz
item.description:
@Patchumz wrote:

If they are weapons, follow my example, but replace the item ID (the 1333) and you can put it anywhere in the client.java, technically.

Read full topic
item.source: EASY QUESTION: How do you make an item Admin/Mod only?

item.title: EASY QUESTION: How do you make an item Admin/Mod only?
item.dc:creator: @Patchumz Patchumz
item.description:
@Patchumz wrote:

Easy, all you have to do is something like this

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1333) && playerRights >2)
{
 deleteItem(1333, getItemSlot(1333);
 sendMessage("This item is Admin Only!");
}

Something like that. playerWeapon can be switched with many things, and i haven’t coded in AGES, so gimme a break, lol… tell me what item is gunna be an admin item and i can help you further.

Read full topic

item.title: EASY QUESTION: How do you make an item Admin/Mod only?
item.dc:creator: @camo_chao camo chao
item.description:
@camo_chao wrote:

YES! I FIGURED OUT HOW! I put in

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3098 && playerRights <1)
{
remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], 3);
sendMessage(“This item is Mod/Admin Only! Become a Mod/Admin!”);
}

Hmmmm, is there a guide on this yet? I don’t want to copy what someone else has done, but I want to make a guide

Read full topic
